title: Bareilly: Bulldozer runs at SP MLA’s petrol pump days after threatening UP CM - Times of India
content:
1. Bareilly: Bulldozer runs at SP MLA’s petrol pump days after threatening UP CM  Times of India
  2. Watch: Samajwadi Party MLA's petrol pump bulldozed after 'threats' to Yogi  Hindustan Times
  3. SP MLA Shazil Imam's Petrol Pump Bulldozed, SP MLA Had Threatened Yogi With Bullets  India Today
  4. UP: SP MLA’s petrol pump demolished year after order, days after Yogi remarks  The Indian Express
  5. Samajwadi Party MLA, who warned Yogi Adityanath, faces action; his unauthorised petrol pump bulldozed  Times Now
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The Bareilly Development Authority has demolished the petrol pump of Samajwadi Party MLA Shazil Islam Ansari. The petrol pump was allegedly constructed without a map approval. A few days ago the SP MLA had allegedly used derogatory language towards ruling party leaders and CM Yogi Adityanath. After the video went viral on social media. SP MLA and a few others were booked.  A complaint was lodged against the SP MLA by Hindu Yuva Vahini on Sunday, April 3 and cops have registered an FIR under Sections 153, 504 and 506 of the IPC. Shazil has been elected for the first time from the Bhojipura seat.
